attributes.action: Designate the first Friday of every month as a "Go Commando Day".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will only apply to persons aged between 18 and 50. Over 50's may apply but must be well fit!!. Exemptions can be imposed if 6 persons object to a particular person taking part. If this occurs the banned person must either, stay indoors on a Friday or wear a coat.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
